stories.title: Quorum - Stories
stories.snippet: In my six years as a condo manager, this is the first time Iâ€™ve ever seen an AGM reach quorum before it was even held. We started getting proxies as soon as owners were notified. It was such a quick and easy process, all I needed to do was print out the completed proxies.
stories.author: JJ Hiew
stories.description: How one condo easily achieved quorum with electronic proxies and saved thousands in meeting costs -- this is the origin story of Quorum.
